name: Better Together (dzil123, BAOTD, artlessAvian)
description:
Winter 2022 Game Jam Theme: Better Together

Eden has been living with their partner. To others, they've been inseperable, but Eden wants some space. They’ve been thinking about picking up a package from their dorm.  Eden convinces their partner to let them go alone, but they only have a few minutes.  

Is it really good to have them move in so fast, be better together?

Credits:

  • Ryan Chang (Lead Writer & Player Movement System)
  • Daniel Zilberleyb (Audio Implementation & Dialogue System)
  • Henry Dang (Producer & Art)
